title: Can we have a funny "Bot Coach" mode? xD
body:
Like, you handle a team of 5 bots, tell them what to max, what to build in which order, which lane to go, then you pit them against other players' bot team at total random matchups.

Tbh this is just a silly idea but it would be funny lol

Not exactly. You are not in _active control_ of the bots. You simply control their items and skill level ups etc, but the bots do all the gameplay.
